title: Pacifist

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Pacified players can't use abilities, talk in day chat or private chats, whisper, vote, edit their last will, answer prompts, choose options, or take literally any other game actions whatsoever.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill or pacify all who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 1590
*I couldn't hurt a fly if I wanted to!*
